title: OIDC scenarion with authorization using `@ClientHeaderParam` doesn't work after move to reactive
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm trying to migrate testing scenarios we have for quarkus-oidc-client-filter / quarkus-oidc-token-propagation / quarkus-rest-client into their reactive variants.

Changes for the move are here: https://github.com/rsvoboda/quarkus-test-suite/commit/818b36371a7f511062377b869fe34407221537f7

There is failure in one scenario called "LookupAuthorization" with authorization using `@ClientHeaderParam` where the Bearer token gets constructed using direct communication with oidc server.
https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite/blob/main/security/keycloak-oidc-client-extended/src/main/java/io/quarkus/ts/security/keycloak/oidcclient/extended/restclient/ping/clients/LookupAuthorizationPongClient.java#L25

I can't say for sure if the trouble is in resteasy-reactive, rest-client-reactive or in oidc extensions.
Thus CCing @sberyozkin, @Sgitario (who created that test coverage ;) ) and @geoand 

### Expected behavior

All tests to pass

### Actual behavior

Test failure
```
[ERROR] Failures:
[ERROR]   OidcRestClientIT.testLookupAuthorization:49->assertPingEndpoints:57->assertPingPong:109 1 expectation failed.
Expected status code <200> but was <500>.

[INFO]
[ERROR] Tests run: 9, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
```

### How to Reproduce?

 - clone https://github.com/rsvoboda/quarkus-test-suite
 - checkout `oidc-client-reactive-filter` branch
 - run `mvn clean verify -pl security/keycloak-oidc-client-extended`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS Monterey

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17
